reviews.text: The staff is very friendly and are very, very prepared to help with any questions, issues, concerns! Just amazing! We arrived before our check-in time and we were so exhausted that they offered us a room to rest in while our room was prepared! They helped us with our booking to Paris via train. The location is great! It was less than a 5 minute walk and there are a few good restaurants around. The staff helped with any issues we had and if they didn't have it, they got it from their sister hotel or would tell us where we could get it. Great breakfast served in the spacious lobby. The decor is very modern and the maintenance of the place is impeccable! Loved the iPad in the reception/bar to order a cab. Great hotel and amazing staff! Highly recommended.
reviews.title: Hidden Gem!

reviews.text: Welcome drink on arrival (I had a beer), which is always a now touch!
reviews.title: Ticks all the boxes

reviews.text: You are greeted by a very white (pure) lobby/reception and a white iPad at front desk that you can use to book taxis, find restaurants etc..again nice touch!
reviews.title: Very enjoyable stay (2 nights) on a business trip.

reviews.text: Easy hassle free check in.
reviews.title: A sleep over hotel

reviews.text: The room a Double Deluxe I think was v nice although not the biggest room I have ever had by far not the smallest either.
reviews.title: Near Frankfurt train station

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Located near the train station and not a far walk from historic sights. The hotel was nice. Very modern. The room was small but clean. Our air-conditioning was broken and the safe was also not working properly upon our arrival. The safe was fixed fairly quickly, but unfortunately we learned too late that the air conditioner was not working. We only stayed one night (and it was a HOT night).
reviews.title: Trendy

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was delicious - various meats, cheeses, fruits, muesli, juices and various coffee/tea offerings! Free internet. There is a beautiful seating area just off the lobby where you can relax after a day of sight-seeing. Neat art installation in the lobby too.
reviews.title: Great hotel

reviews.text: Stayed in Franfurt for an overnight layover on our way to Namibia. Hotel was well located to allow for sightseeing as we had the entire day before our flight. Staff was friendly and helpful. They arranged a transfer to the airport for us with a super nice driver. He was very helpful and refused to accept a tip. The rate to the airport was reasonable. Breakfast at the hotel was great. The hotel does not serve dinner, but there are restaurants close by.
reviews.title: Trendy and Nice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I am not one to like a hotel for "trendiness" over practicality but this hotel was a nice find when my usualy airport hotel was booked. Nice ambiance, comfortable, friendly staff and reasonable price. I would definitely recommend and would stay again.
reviews.title: Great hotel

reviews.text: Visited Frankfurt for a conference so did not see much of the city itself but this hotel was very convenient for the Messe. Very modern and clean - with excellent service from the staff. The breakfast buffet could do with better labelling for the non-german guests as often in the hot buffet there were things that were not explained/labelled but other than that - great halloween decorations and somewhere I'd stay again
reviews.title: Nice, Clean, and Priced Well

reviews.text: I arrived in Frankfurt, about 6 am, after a long flight from Brisbane, 22 hours, all told, and really tired, and to my surprise the room was ready, and what a room, !
reviews.title: excellent value,

reviews.text: So comfortable, the best sleep I've had anywhere, the bed and linen, pillows, etc, superb,and a wonderful bathroom, and all lotions,
reviews.title: Enjoyable stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The best was being able to open the windows and get fresh air, ! and on the 4th floor , leave the window open at night, and be safe, as no balcony,
reviews.title: What a nice place!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A wonderful breakfast buffet, very central to main railway station, & a lot of cafes, eateries all around, and staff so helpful & friendly, it really lives up to the idea of " home away from home," certainly recommend, I've told my travel agent for her future clients, , Michele @ Brisbane , 3 nights, mid August,2012, thanks Dominik, Dimitri, Roy, and sorry girls, I can't recall the names,
reviews.title: Heimat away from our heimat

reviews.text: I arrived a the hotel at 8 am after a 12 hour flight ;and expected to have to wait until 12 noon for the room to be ready. To my surprise the check-in form had already been filled in; the room was ready and I could partake from the breakfast buffet.
reviews.title: nice trendy hotel, good price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Main train station right around the corner and 15 min walk to shopping and old town. Unfortunately the strip clubs are close also. The hotel is clean, staff helpful and room had high ceilings with romantic low lighting. We had a street front room on first floor which was quite noisy. Breakfast was exceptional with great background music. Unfortunately the floor was being vacuumed while we were eating. Not cool at 9 am. 15 min cab ride to airport.
reviews.title: Nice hotel. Fantastic breakfast. Great value.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our first hotel stop on our Europe trip so we were not sure what to expect. The staff we friendly enough. The hotel is a short 5 min walk from the central train station which connects to the airport. We walked all over Frankfurt from the hotel convenient spot. We found a tour company and booked a day trip on the Rhine which was beautiful. The breakfast is just brilliant the best yogurt we had in europe! We had a basic room on the top floor. Room was modern good WIFI reletively clean and bed was very comfortable. Not sure but we noticed some hotels in Europe mustn't use bleach to clean as we noticed black mould in the grout in the shower tiles nothing too offensive though. We only stayed one night so based on that it was satisfactory stay for a stopover.
reviews.title: 10 Year anniversary

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed 2 nights in September and enjoyed our stay. The hotel is a very short walk from the station and about a 10 minute walk to the Alstadt and the extensive shopping area. A welcome drink on arrival was a nice touch and the staff were young and very helpful. It was a reasonable size room, very clean, with a comfortable bed. The air con was fairly weak and it was pretty quiet at night. I did have trouble with the wifi connection one night, but it was fine the second night. The hotel is eco friendly.
reviews.title: Great location, friendly staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There are some nice restaurants nearby (on the station side of the hotel), but some "dodgy" looking places further away. The breakfast at the hotel was great with good variety. I recommend this hotel for a short stay in Frankfurt.
reviews.title: Be careful of the neighbourhood

reviews.text: The Pure is a great hotel, very modern, friendly staff, handy to the main railway station (walking distance even with luggage) and the river. The hotel is mainly white, with some very unusual art works on the walls (and the floor!). We had 3 nights here at the end of a long holiday, and it was very enjoyable. the welcome drink on arrival is a nice touch. Just be careful when you go for a walk - one end of Niddastrasse is not an area you'd want to find yourself alone in at night
reviews.title: Good Location, have everything I need.
